Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/11th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 9th, Wabash, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/11th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 9th, Wabash, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/11th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near 69th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 69th due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near O'Hare
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near O'Hare due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near O'Hare due to an unauthorized person on the tracks

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
